title: Fatal error: stack overflow
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon version 2.41.0-stable-52d5f37b

OS & Version: Ubuntu 22.04.2 LTS

Commit hash: 52d5f37b

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

`/usr/local/bin/erigon --datadir=/home/erigon/mainnet --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090 --prune=htc --prune.r.before=11052984 --metrics --metrics.addr 0.0.0.0 --http=false --ws=false --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 --authrpc.vhosts="*" --externalcl`

Concensus Layer: Lighthouse v3.5.1-319cc61

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

```
lighthouse bn \
    --metrics \
    --validator-monitor-auto \
    --http --http-address 0.0.0.0 --http-allow-origin "*" \
    --builder http://127.0.0.1:18550 \
    --execution-endpoint http://0.0.0.0:8551 \
    --execution-jwt /home/lighthouse/jwt.hex \
    --checkpoint-sync-url https://sync-mainnet.beaconcha.in/ \
    --purge-db
```

Chain/Network: Ethereum mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

Node was fully sync-ed before and keeping up just fine.

#### Actual behaviour

It stopped working (without upgrade) and bumping versions (up or down) does not help.
If starting the binary with a new data folder, everything works fine, which tells me the data got corrupted somehow.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
